conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric-style 3D conversion with clean geometry and consistent lighting.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Perfect execution of 3D volume, wall thickness, and orthographic projection.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Layout is highly faithful. Notable minor inaccuracies in the hall-to-living room transition and the orientation of the bathtub.

interior_elements.notes: Excellent furniture mapping. Major fixtures like the tub, toilet, kitchen appliances, and bedroom sets are correctly translated.

visual_clarity.notes: High clarity and professional rendering. No text contamination or major artifacts.

detected_errors.description: The wall separating the hall from the living room is rendered as a full-height solid wall, whereas the 2D plan implies a more open transition/partial wall.
Bathtub orientation in bathroom is rotated 90 degrees compared to the plan.

summary: A highly accurate and aesthetically pleasing 3D transformation that maintains nearly perfect room proportions and furniture placement.
